participant_1.name: Linda
participant_1.personality: Creative and warm-hearted, she enjoys expressing herself through music and values personal connections.
participant_1.background: I like to sing in my room when no one is around. I have fibromyalgia, so I need to stay warm this winter. I m retired. I have a crummy job at scrubway. I would love to have lunch with Justin Bieber because he is my favorite singer and I would love to learn more about him and his music.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Energetic and nurturing, she balances her passion for music with her responsibilities as a full-time mom.
participant_2.background: I like to watch my dolphins swimming in the ocean. I was a musician before my current job. I enjoy horseback riding. I am a full time mom. I enjoy putting alcohol in my coffee.

content.text: Good, and you? What do you like to do for fun?
I love to sing! When no one is around I will sing my heart out.
I bet you're really good! I used to be a musician before I became a full time mom.
Oh that's cool, what kind of music did you play?
I played guitar in a band. We did a lot of original music and some covers.
That's amazing! I would love to hear you play sometime.
I'd be happy to play for you! I haven't played in a while but I'm sure I can still remember a few songs.
That would be awesome! I'm always looking for new music to listen to.
I have a lot of old CDs that I could bring over. You can listen to them and tell me what you think.
Sounds like a plan! I'm free this weekend if you want to come over.
That would be great! I'll bring over some CDs and we can have a listening party.
Sounds fun! I'll see you then!
